alert.note: Alert for Sussex; Warren (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 3:48AM EST until December 28 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Sussex and Warren. In Pennsylvania, Berks, Lehigh and Northampton. * WHEN...From 11 AM Monday to midnight EST Monday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery conditions on roadways and sidewalks. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
